form.PN:
od 1. do 4. pomena besedo izgovarjamo
/k*QntEnt/
, od 5. do 8. pa
/k@7nt*ent/
.

sense.def:
The contents of something
, na primer škatle ali sobe, so stvari, ki so v njej.

seg.quote: He drank the contents of his glass in one gulp.

sense.def:
The contents of something
, na primer dokumenta ali traku, so stvari, ki so na njem napisane ali posnete.

seg.quote: He knew by heart the contents of the note.

sense.def:
The content of a piece of writing, speech, or television programme
so téme ali zamisli, ki jih obravnava zapis, govor ali televizijska oddaja.

seg.quote: I was disturbed by the content of some of the speeches.

sense.def:
The content of something
je tudi količina ali sorazmerje nečesa, kar vsebuje neka snov.

seg.quote: No other food has such a high iron content.

sense.def:
Če je človek
content
, je srečen in zadovoljen.

seg.quote: However hard up they were, they stayed content.

sense.def:
Če je človek
content with something
, je s tistim zadovoljen. Če je
content to do something
, tisto stori prostovoljno.

seg.quote: Children are not content with glib explanations.
A few teachers were content to pay the fines.

sense.def:
To content oneself with something
pomeni nekaj sprejeti in se ne truditi, da bi storili ali imeli kaj drugega.

seg.quote: She didn't take part in the discussion, but contented herself with smoking cigarettes.
